error.title: Collect Writes
error.description:
## Missing Frames!
Collect writes plugin could not find expected rendered files. Expected to find rendered files from {write_node_name} in output path location:
{output_path}
### How to repair?
- Check {write_node_name} output exists - Correct write path if write path is wrong - Submit render and try publishing again once render completes and is QC'd
error.detail:
### __Detailed Info__ (optional)
This error is shown when there are no files on disk matching the output path given by the publishing target write node
